(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB hand)
            (NP (PRP it))
            (PP (TO to)
              (NP (NNP Pepsi)))
            (PP (IN for)
              (S
                (VP (VBG coming)
                  (PRT (RP up))
                  (PP (IN with)
                    (NP (DT the) (DT the)
                      (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ creative)
                        (CC and)
                        (JJ crazy))
                      (NNS ads))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(got-2, You-1)
root(ROOT-0, got-2)
aux(hand-4, to-3)
xcomp(got-2, hand-4)
dobj(hand-4, it-5)
prep(hand-4, to-6)
pobj(to-6, Pepsi-7)
prep(hand-4, for-8)
pcomp(for-8, coming-9)
prt(coming-9, up-10)
prep(coming-9, with-11)
predet(ads-18, the-12)
det(ads-18, the-13)
advmod(creative-15, most-14)
amod(ads-18, creative-15)
cc(creative-15, and-16)
conj(creative-15, crazy-17)
pobj(with-11, ads-18)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (PRP$ their) (JJS latest) (NN promo)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
poss(promo-4, their-2)
amod(promo-4, latest-3)
pobj(In-1, promo-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD got)
        (PRT (RP together))
        (NP
          (NP (CD five))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJS biggest) (NNS names))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NN soccer)))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD put)
        (NP (PRP them))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (JJS most) (JJ outlandish) (NNS situations)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(got-2, they-1)
root(ROOT-0, got-2)
prt(got-2, together-3)
dobj(got-2, five-4)
prep(five-4, of-5)
det(names-8, the-6)
amod(names-8, biggest-7)
pobj(of-5, names-8)
prep(names-8, in-9)
pobj(in-9, soccer-10)
cc(got-2, and-11)
conj(got-2, put-12)
dobj(put-12, them-13)
prep(put-12, in-14)
det(situations-18, the-15)
amod(situations-18, most-16)
amod(situations-18, outlandish-17)
pobj(in-14, situations-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (ADVP (RB even))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (NNP Fabregas))
          (VP (VBD dressed)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (PP (IN like)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Indiana) (NNP Jones))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Amazon)
                    (CC and)
                    (NNP Lampard)))))
            (S
              (VP (VBG doing)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NNP Jackie) (NNP Chan) (NN style) (NN kick))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Hong) (NNP Kong))))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(got-3, They-1)
advmod(got-3, even-2)
root(ROOT-0, got-3)
nsubj(dressed-5, Fabregas-4)
ccomp(got-3, dressed-5)
prt(dressed-5, up-6)
prep(dressed-5, like-7)
nn(Jones-9, Indiana-8)
pobj(like-7, Jones-9)
prep(Jones-9, in-10)
det(Amazon-12, the-11)
pobj(in-10, Amazon-12)
cc(Amazon-12, and-13)
conj(Amazon-12, Lampard-14)
xcomp(dressed-5, doing-15)
det(kick-20, a-16)
nn(kick-20, Jackie-17)
nn(kick-20, Chan-18)
nn(kick-20, style-19)
dobj(doing-15, kick-20)
prep(kick-20, in-21)
nn(Kong-23, Hong-22)
pobj(in-21, Kong-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Pepsi) (NNP Max))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ their) (JJS latest) (JJ Zero) (NNP Calorie) (NN drink))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB just))
              (VP (VBG being)
                (VP (VBN launched)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Singapore))))))))))
    (. .)))


nn(Max-2, Pepsi-1)

cop(drink-8, is-3)
poss(drink-8, their-4)
amod(drink-8, latest-5)
amod(drink-8, Zero-6)
nn(drink-8, Calorie-7)
root(ROOT-0, drink-8)

advmod(launched-13, just-11)
auxpass(launched-13, being-12)

prep(launched-13, in-14)
pobj(in-14, Singapore-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Nowadays))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB always))
    (VP (VBP go)
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ low) (JJ calorie) (JJ soft) (NN drink))
          (PP (IN as)
            (NP (DT an) (NN alternative)))))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ normal) (JJ soft) (NN drink))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (MD can)
                (VP (VB have)
                  (NP
                    (NP
                      (QP (RB as) (JJ much) (IN as) (CD 6) (TO to) (CD 10))
                      (NNS teaspoons))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN sugar)))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(go-4, Nowadays-1)
nsubj(go-4, I-2)
advmod(go-4, always-3)
root(ROOT-0, go-4)
prep(go-4, for-5)
det(drink-10, a-6)
amod(drink-10, low-7)
amod(drink-10, calorie-8)
amod(drink-10, soft-9)
pobj(for-5, drink-10)
prep(drink-10, as-11)
det(alternative-13, an-12)
pobj(as-11, alternative-13)
prep(go-4, to-14)
det(drink-18, the-15)
amod(drink-18, normal-16)
amod(drink-18, soft-17)
pobj(to-14, drink-18)
nsubj(have-21, which-19)
aux(have-21, can-20)
rcmod(drink-18, have-21)
quantmod(10-27, as-22)
quantmod(10-27, much-23)
quantmod(10-27, as-24)
number(10-27, 6-25)
dep(10-27, to-26)
num(teaspoons-28, 10-27)

    (VP (VBZ means)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))

              (NP
                (QP (RB around) (CD 130))
                (NNS calories))
              (PP (IN by)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG drinking)
                    (NP (JJ low) (NNS calories))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S (CC but)
    (NP (DT a) (JJ fizzy) (NN drink))
    (VP (VBZ does)
      (VP (VB help)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB cut)
              (PP (IN through)
                (NP
                  (NP (PDT all) (DT that) (NN fat))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (DT a) (NNP Char) (NNP Kway) (NNP Teow)
                      (CC or)
                      (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))))))))))
    (. .)))

              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (MD can)

                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB win)
                        (NP
                          (QP (CD 4) (CD 52))
                          (NN inch) (NN HD) (NNS TVs))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (JJ sure)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (NNS fans))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (JJ popular) (JJ online) (NN role) (NN playing) (NN game))))
            (VP (MD will)
              (VP (VB be)
                (ADJP (RB quite) (JJ pleased))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT All))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP need)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP
            (VP (VB buy)
              (ADVP (RB either))
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (CD 1.5) (NNP L) (NN bottle))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Pepsi))
                    (CC or)
                    (NP (DT a) (CD six) (NN pack))))))
            (CC and)
            (VP
              (VP (VB cut)
                (PRT (RP out))
                (NP (DT the) (JJ instant) (NN win) (NN sticker)))
              (CC and)
              (VP (VB see)
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP what))
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP have)
                      (VP (VBN won)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-6, All-1)
nsubj(need-3, you-2)
rcmod(All-1, need-3)
aux(do-5, to-4)
xcomp(need-3, do-5)
root(ROOT-0, is-6)
aux(buy-8, to-7)
xcomp(is-6, buy-8)
advmod(buy-8, either-9)
det(bottle-13, a-10)
num(bottle-13, 1.5-11)
nn(bottle-13, L-12)
dobj(buy-8, bottle-13)
prep(bottle-13, of-14)
pobj(of-14, Pepsi-15)
cc(Pepsi-15, or-16)
det(pack-19, a-17)
num(pack-19, six-18)
conj(Pepsi-15, pack-19)
cc(buy-8, and-20)
conj(buy-8, cut-21)
prt(cut-21, out-22)
det(sticker-26, the-23)
amod(sticker-26, instant-24)
nn(sticker-26, win-25)
dobj(cut-21, sticker-26)
cc(cut-21, and-27)
conj(cut-21, see-28)
dobj(won-32, what-29)
nsubj(won-32, you-30)
aux(won-32, have-31)
ccomp(see-28, won-32)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJR More) (NNS details))
      (CC and)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJR better) (NN video))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NN Ad)))))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBN found)
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Pepsi) (NNP Singapore) (NN website))))))
    (. .)))
